name: Celer Bridged USDC (Oasys)
description: The Oasys Chain is a public blockchain tailored for gaming, aiming to advance Web3 and the metaverse. Its unique ""Oasys Architecture"" features a Hub-Layer for stability and a Verse-Layer for high-speed processing with zero gas fees. Utilizing Proof-of-Stake, it balances energy efficiency and security while offering EVM compatibility for easy migration of Ethereum apps. Centered around the $OAS token, it supports staking and governance. Backed by major gaming companies, it provides developer tools and an NFT bridge, driving the adoption of blockchain gaming.
